term.title: sulfimides

item.text: H2S=NH, sulfimide, and its hydrocarbyl derivatives. They are thus related to sulfoxides in the same way that imines are related to aldehydes or ketones, e.g. (C2H5)2S=NPh S,S-diethyl-N-phenylsulfimide.
A term used in Chemical Abstracts Service Index Nomenclature for sulfonylamines, RN=S(=O)2.
